title: Wham's 'Last Christmas' tops global charts, outshines Mariah Carey | News | kitv.com
text:
Wham's 'Last Christmas' tops global charts, outshines Mariah Carey
Weather Alert
...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 PM HST THIS AFTERNOON FOR THE ISLAND OF OAHU IN HONOLULU COUNTY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...The island of Oahu in Honolulu County. * WHEN...Until 115 PM HST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding on roads, poor drainage areas, and in streams. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 948 AM HST, A nearly continuous line of showers continues moving over Oahu from the southwest. Heaviest rain is expected to continue falling at rates of 1 to 2 inches per hour. - Some locations that may experience flooding include... the island of Oahu. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Stay away from streams, drainage ditches and low lying areas prone to flooding. A Flood Watch is also in effect for Kauai and Oahu until 6 PM HST this evening. && This advisory may need to be extended beyond 115 PM HST if flooding; persists.
...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH 6 PM HST TODAY FOR THE ISLANDS OF NIIHAU KAUAI AND OAHU... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Kauai, Oahu, and Niihau. * WHEN...Through this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Significant flooding may occur due to the overflow of streams and drainages. Roads in several areas may be closed, along with property damage in urban or low lying spots due to runoff. Landslides may also occur in areas with steep terrain. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - A slowly moving low level trough near Kauai and Oahu will continue to produce periods of moderate to locally heavy showers and isolated thunderstorms today with potential flooding impacts over the islands of Niihau, Kauai, and Oahu. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued. &&
...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Southerly winds up to 25 kt along the trough. Seas building up to 11 feet late this afternoon. * WHERE...Kauai Northwest Waters, Kauai Windward Waters, Kauai Leeward Waters, Kauai Channel, Oahu Windward Waters, Oahu Leeward Waters and Kaiwi Channel. * WHEN...Until 6 AM HST Friday. * IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller vessels, should avoid navigating in these conditions. &&
